p: Four isoproteic (41% crude protein) and isolipidic (12% crude lipid) diets were formulated with the fish oil (FO), soybean oil (SO), linseed oil (LO), and palm oil (PO) as the main lipid sources. The oils purchased from Great Seven Biotechnology Co., Ltd, Qingdao, China and fatty acid profiles of oils were detected ( Supplementary Table S1). Large yellow croaker of similar size (mean weight 10.07 Â± 0.03 g) from Fu Fa Aquatic Products Co., Ltd., Ningde, China were reared for ten weeks and trail in floating sea cages. Fish were fed with each diet to satiation by hand twice daily at 5:00 and 17:00. At the end of the experiment, samples of intestine, spleen, kidney, gill, liver, eye, heart, muscle, brain, and adipose tissue were collected and snap-frozen in liquid nitrogen after fish fasted for 24 h.
